settings.heading: Refund And Cancellation
settings.content:
Order Cancellations:

Since we sell made-to-order products, we cannot cancel orders once the production process is initiated (This includes the predesigned Products in the Website shop section). However, a customer can cancel the product/sign purchased within 4 Hours only from the time of purchase. Beyond 4 Hours the order is deemed final and cannot be canceled. You will be required to send an email with the subject line "Cancel Order <Order Number>" to hello@crazyneon.com within 4 Hours of ordering in order to be eligible for cancellation and refund.

Kindly note, 

  • We do not cancel custom orders with pre-approved designs, you can modify the design as per your requirements as many times as you wish before the initiation of the production process.
  • After the refund is processed it may take up to 8 - 10 business days to reflect in your account.

Returns/Replacement/Refunds:

CrazyNeon assures its customers, the products we offer are free from any manufacturing defect. Unfortunately, in the emergence of such a case, we provide hassle-free assistance to all the customers. Kindly note, We offer Replacements for faulty products and will make every effort to resolve the issue and may fix, or replace the faulty product after careful inspection of the delivered products.  The final resolution for faulty products, including refunds for the cost of the product and/or shipping, is decided on a case-by-case basis depending on the source of the fault, and warranty guidelines (Insert Warranty page link) and is at the sole discretion of CrazyNeon. 

To start a replacement or refund request contact us at hello@crazyneon.com

Damages and issues

Please inspect your order upon reception if the item is defective, or damaged or if you have received the wrong item, contact us immediately. We require you to always record video and click pictures while unboxing the received product as proof for speedy and undisputed claims. If the package received is damaged, punctured, or bent from any side or corner it is advisable to take clear pictures before opening the box. This is required to claim insurance from the shipping company.  

We only provide replacements if the provided proofs are validated by our team. Please note, we do not offer any refund in case of manufacturing defects or damaged or lost products. We assure unbiased assistance and customer support and may offer a brand-new replacement for absolute customer satisfaction.  Kindly refer to the ‘Warranty Section’ and ‘Shipping policy’ for more details. n your own neon sign. Follow these simple steps below:

 

  • Head over to the “Design your neon sign” tab and scroll below to start creating your own sign.
  • Choose the text and the font you want for your neon sign from the variety of options available.
  • Align the text and pick a color from the list of ten colors provided.
  • You can now choose the font size and even put your own custom size as per your needs.
  • Choose the background color and then the mounting options, whether you want it to be wall mounted or simply hanged.
  • Finally, decide if you want your custom led sign to be hung indoors or outdoors.
  • The best part is you also have the option of making any special request if you have one.

You'll receive a unique, custom neon LED sign in 7-10 business days. We have developed a simple application that enables you to design your own the neon sign and provides a visual mock-up so you can see final product before placing your order. Feel free to reach out to us for a free custom quote.
